proposed_strategy.name: Single Unit Processing
proposed_strategy.description: Since the provided text represents a complete, small, single logical unit (a Praśna), it will be processed entirely as one chunk, well within the safety limit.

execution_plan.description: The entirety of the Third Praśna, including the primary text (Mantras 1-12) and the Prakāśikā commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The text is structured as numbered Mantras, each followed by its respective 'Prakāśikā' commentary, forming the primary atomic unit of analysis.

start_pattern.description: The starting marker is the Devanagari verse number enclosed in double delimiters, found immediately following the primary verse text.

end_pattern.description: The unit ends just before the start pattern of the subsequent Mantra, or at the concluding marker of the Praśna.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial lines containing the Grantha title (प्रश्नोपनिषत्), the Praśna title (तृतीयः प्रश्नः), and the topical heading (प्राणकार्यभेदाः) should be retained as document context before parsing the first Mantra (Mantra 1).
